subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A 40-year-old Bronx man was arrested at Shea Stadium on Friday night during the Mets’ game after being accused of trying to blind Atlanta Braves players with a high-power flashlight.
snippet: A 40-year-old Bronx man was arrested at Shea Stadium on Friday night during the Mets’ game after being accused of trying to blind Atlanta Braves players with a high-power flashlight.
